Package viewcontrollers

package viewcontrollers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddModifyController
    Describes the base properties of any controller class for views which involve adding or modifying items.
    AddModifyPartScreen
    Manages user interaction with the screen used to both add and modify Parts.
    AddModifyProductScreen
    Manages user interaction with the screens used to add and modify Products.
    Controller
    Describes methods common to all view controllers
    MainScreen
    Manages user interaction with the program's main screen.
